Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1981...
Injured on 7/19/1981 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/9/1981 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1985, off Adrian Devine (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1985, off Kevin Kobel (LA)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1985, hitting .414 with 5 HR, 13 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 8/16/1985...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1985, hitting .265 with 26 HR, 113 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1985...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1986, hitting .333 with 7 HR, 25 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1986...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 8/15/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1987, hitting .423 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Texas on 1/31/1988 (Going to CHC: P F. Eufemia. Going to TEX: 3B J. Carter)...
Injured on 5/29/1989 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 6/29/1989 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1989...
